title: PowerToys Peek is a Windows version of macOS Quick Look coming soon
content:
Microsoft’s PowerToys app is adding a new feature called Peek in the near future. If you’re familiar with macOS, you may know of the Quick Look, which lets you quickly preview files at the press of a button. PowerToys Peek is essentially a Windows version of Quick Look, and you can use a keyboard shortcut

The post PowerToys Peek is a Windows version of macOS Quick Look coming soon appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft's PowerToys suite of tools for Windows 10 and Windows 11 is adding a new Peek feature that lets you quickly preview files.
